page.title: 18Housing
page.content: In this area there are not many houses, with the exception of the North West corner which accounts for well over 55O,on roads leading out of the town built mostly in the last 4O years. About 4O% are privately owned - most built in the last 15/2O years. Around the countryside there have been some good conversions and restoration of old farmhouses and cottages. Around 6O% have been built by the District Council including flats and bungalows. It is now possible to purchase some houses and about 17% of tenants are now house owners. There are small portions of land let out for cultivation.In the North West area there is about an acre divided into sixteen plots used by people for growing vegetables, very popular now that most homes have freezers.
